Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2018 03:02PM jipovil99 wrote: It is disgusting that companies are trying to make money by giving false hope. No conditioning gel will keep you from losing eyelashes or eyebrows. Penciling eyebrows is possible, but when you are sick from chemo it's too much trouble. I'm wearing a wig (avoid it as much as possible because of the itching), but I never got used to being without lashes or brows. It's not a good look. But the good thing is that they come back. I now have eyebrows again.
